scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports spec/retext-directionality.spec.js
scripts.lint: node_modules/.bin/eslint index.js --env node --env browser --rule 'quotes: [2, single]' && node_modules/.bin/eslint spec/retext-directionality.spec.js --env node --env mocha --rule 'quotes: [2, single], no-loop-func: false' && node_modules/.bin/jscs index.js spec/retext-directionality.spec.js --reporter=inline
scripts.make: npm run-script lint && npm run-script coverage
